responder-rule
**************


Description
===========

A ResponderRule resource contains the default settings for a single
responder rule that Cloud Guard provides.

A ResponderRule resource: * Is used as the original source for a rule
in an Oracle-managed responder of the specified type. * Is not
directly visible in the Cloud Guard UI. * Canâ€™t be modified by users,
programmatically or through the UI. * May be modified from time to
time by Cloud Guard.


Available Commands
==================

* get

* list
